items.sentence: I don\'t want to go anywhere today. It\'s cold outside and I have to get up early tomorrow.
There are seedless grapes and seedless watermelons. I wonder if there are seedless mangoes.
I\'m surprised Tom\'s still alive. I thought he would\'ve drunk himself to death years ago.
Tom told the children that they could stay here in the room if they didn\'t make any noise.
Tom shouted at the top of his lungs so Mary could hear him over the sound of the waterfall.
